snippet: Michael C. Woodford, a former chief executive of the Olympus Corporation, will receive £10 million ($15.4 million) in a settlement over his dismissal from the company.
abstract: Olympus Corporation announces that it will pay former chief executive Michael C Woodford $15.4 million in a settlement over his dismissal from the company; Olympus also announces that it will cut 2,700 jobs.
lead_paragraph: Michael C. Woodford, a former chief executive of the Olympus Corporation, will receive £10 million ($15.4 million) in a settlement over his dismissal from the company.

headline.main: Olympus to Pay $15.4. Million to Its Former Chief
